name: Frog Name Generator
description: Ribbiting for the perfect froggy moniker? Hop on in! Our Frog Name Generator conjures up names that are toad-ally awesome, from the delightfully dignified to the utterly absurd. Find the ideal name for your pet frog, your D&D character, or just for a laugh!
introduction: Ever wondered what a frog would call itself if it had the chance? Probably something way cooler than 'Froggy McFrogface'. That's where we come in! Our generator dives deep into the lily pad of linguistic possibilities to bring you a symphony of amphibian appellations. Prepare for names so good, they'll make you croak with delight!
howToUse: Simply click the 'Generate' button and behold the majesty of randomly generated frog names!
Don't like what you see? Keep clicking! We've got more frog names than there are flies at a picnic.
Feeling creative? Mix and match prefixes and suffixes to craft your own custom croaker creation.
Found the *perfect* name? Copy it and share your newfound froggy friend's identity with the world! #FrogNames #RibbitingResults

faqs.question: Are these names actually good for frogs?
faqs.answer: Well, frogs don't really care about names. But *you* do! And these names are guaranteed to be more interesting than 'Greeny'.

faqs.question: Can I use these names for my fantasy characters?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Whether it's a frog-like familiar, a swamp-dwelling sorcerer, or a ribbiting rogue, our names will add a touch of amphibian authenticity.

faqs.question: Are the names generated completely random?
faqs.answer: Yes! We use a sophisticated (okay, maybe not *that* sophisticated) algorithm to combine prefixes and suffixes in unexpected and hilarious ways.

faqs.question: I generated a really weird name. Is that normal?
faqs.answer: Perfectly normal! Embrace the weirdness! Some of the best names are the ones that make you scratch your head and say, 'Huh?'

faqs.question: Can I suggest new prefixes or suffixes?
faqs.answer: We'd love to hear your ideas! Send them our way, and if they're frog-tastic enough, we might just add them to the generator.

faqs.question: Is this generator free?
faqs.answer: You bet your lily pad it is! Use it as much as you like, spread the word, and let the frog-naming frenzy begin!
